languages.text: Большинство этих чудес сводилось к тому, что техника отказывалась служить еретикам и ксеносам, обращаясь против них и безжалостно губя владельцев. Сразу несколько нечеловеческих либо не подчиненных Империуму миров были отброшены назад в развитии — в глазах их обитателей любая машина несла в себе угрозу.

Most of the miracles came down to technology refusing to obey xenos and heretics, turning against them and leading them to their demise. Several non-human or non-Imperium worlds were set back in their development, as their inhabitants saw any machine as a potential threat.
languages.original_text: Большинство этих чудес сводилось к тому, что техника отказывалась служить еретикам и ксеносам, обращаясь против них и безжалостно губя владельцев. Сразу несколько нечеловеческих либо не подчиненных Империуму миров были отброшены назад в развитии — в глазах их обитателей любая машина несла в себе угрозу.

traits.locale_text: Most of the miracles came down to technology disobeying xenos and heretics, turning on them and leading them to their demise. Several non-human or non-Imperium worlds were set back in their development, as in the eyes of their inhabitants any machine harboured a great danger.

Most of the miracles came down to technology disobeying xenos and heretics, turning on them and leading them to their demise. Several non-human or non-Imperium worlds were set back in their development, as in the eyes of their inhabitants any machine harboured a great danger.

Most of the miracles came down to technology refusing to obey xenos and heretics, turning against them and leading them to their demise. Several non-human or non-Imperium worlds were set back in their development, as their inhabitants saw any machine as a potential threat.

Most of the miracles came down to technology refusing to obey xenos and heretics, turning against them and leading them to their demise. Several non-human or non-Imperium worlds were set back in their development, as their inhabitants saw any machine as a potential threat.

Most of the miracles came down to technology refusing to obey xenos and heretics, turning against them and leading them to their demise. Several non-human or non-Imperium worlds were set back in their development, as their inhabitants saw any machine as a potential threat.

Most of the miracles came down to technology refusing to obey xenos and heretics, turning against them and leading them to their demise. Several non-human or non-Imperium worlds were set back in their development, as their inhabitants saw any machine as a potential threat.

languages.text: 绝大多数奇迹的表现都是机器拒绝服从异形和异端，倒戈相向，将他们尽数摧毁。部分异形与异端世界的发展受到了阻碍，这些世界的居民将所有机器都视为潜在的威胁。
languages.original_text: Most of the miracles came down to technology refusing to obey xenos and heretics, turning against them and leading them to their demise. Several non-human or non-Imperium worlds were set back in their development, as their inhabitants saw any machine as a potential threat.

traits.locale_text: 绝大多数奇迹的表现都是机器拒绝服从异形和异端，倒戈相向，将他们尽数摧毁。部分异形与异端世界的发展受到了阻碍，这些世界的居民将所有机器都视为潜在的威胁。

languages.text: Die meisten der Wunder bestanden darin, dass Technologie sich weigerte, Xenos und Ketzern zu gehorchen, sondern sich gegen sie stellte und ihren Niedergang herbeiführte. Mehrere Welten, die nicht von Menschen bewohnt wurden und nicht zum Imperium gehörten, wurden in ihrer Entwicklung zurückgeworfen, da die Bewohner jede Maschine als potenzielle Gefahr ansahen.
languages.original_text: Most of the miracles came down to technology refusing to obey xenos and heretics, turning against them and leading them to their demise. Several non-human or non-Imperium worlds were set back in their development, as their inhabitants saw any machine as a potential threat.

traits.locale_text: Die meisten der Wunder bestanden darin, dass Technologie sich weigerte, Xenos und Ketzern zu gehorchen, sondern sich gegen sie stellte und ihren Niedergang herbeiführte. Mehrere Welten, die nicht von Menschen bewohnt wurden und nicht zum Imperium gehörten, wurden in ihrer Entwicklung zurückgeworfen, da die Bewohner jede Maschine als potenzielle Gefahr ansahen.

languages.text: Dans la plupart des cas, ces miracles venaient de technologies qui refusaient d'obéir aux xénos et aux hérétiques, se retournant même contre eux jusqu'à provoquer leur mort. De nombreux mondes non humains ou hors de l'Imperium subirent des régressions importantes, car leurs habitants considéraient toutes les machines comme des menaces potentielles.
languages.original_text: Most of the miracles came down to technology refusing to obey xenos and heretics, turning against them and leading them to their demise. Several non-human or non-Imperium worlds were set back in their development, as their inhabitants saw any machine as a potential threat.

traits.locale_text: Dans la plupart des cas, ces miracles venaient de technologies qui refusaient d'obéir aux xénos et aux hérétiques, se retournant même contre eux jusqu'à provoquer leur mort. De nombreux mondes non humains ou hors de l'Imperium subirent des régressions importantes, car leurs habitants considéraient toutes les machines comme des menaces potentielles.

languages.text: La mayor parte de los milagros consistieron en máquinas que se negaban a obedecer a xenos y herejes, se rebelaban contra ellos y causaban su perdición. Varios mundos no humanos y no imperiales sufrieron un retroceso en su desarrollo, ya que sus habitantes comenzaron a ver toda máquina como una posible amenaza.
languages.original_text: Most of the miracles came down to technology refusing to obey xenos and heretics, turning against them and leading them to their demise. Several non-human or non-Imperium worlds were set back in their development, as their inhabitants saw any machine as a potential threat.

traits.locale_text: La mayor parte de los milagros consistieron en máquinas que se negaban a obedecer a xenos y herejes, se rebelaban contra ellos y causaban su perdición. Varios mundos no humanos y no imperiales sufrieron un retroceso en su desarrollo, ya que sus habitantes comenzaron a ver toda máquina como una posible amenaza.

languages.text: 奇跡の多くは、テクノロジーが異種族や異端者に従うことを拒否し、それらに敵対し、破滅に導いたことに起因している。いくつかの非人類または非帝国の惑星は、その住民があらゆる機械を潜在的な脅威とみなしたため、発展に遅れが生じた。
languages.original_text: Most of the miracles came down to technology refusing to obey xenos and heretics, turning against them and leading them to their demise. Several non-human or non-Imperium worlds were set back in their development, as their inhabitants saw any machine as a potential threat.

traits.locale_text: 奇跡の多くは、テクノロジーが異種族や異端者に従うことを拒否し、それらに敵対し、破滅に導いたことに起因している。いくつかの非人類または非帝国の惑星は、その住民があらゆる機械を潜在的な脅威とみなしたため、発展に遅れが生じた。

languages.text: Meydana gelen çoğu mucize, zenolara ve kâfirlere itaat etmeyi reddeden teknolojilerle alakalıydı. Onların düşmanı oluyor ve sonlarının gelmesine yol açıyorlardı. İnsan dışı veya İmparatorluk dışı dünyalardan bazılarının gelişimi durma noktasına geldi. Bu dünyalarda yaşayanlar, makineleri potansiyel bir tehdit olarak görmeye başladı.
languages.original_text: Most of the miracles came down to technology refusing to obey xenos and heretics, turning against them and leading them to their demise. Several non-human or non-Imperium worlds were set back in their development, as their inhabitants saw any machine as a potential threat.

traits.locale_text: Meydana gelen çoğu mucize, zenolara ve kâfirlere itaat etmeyi reddeden teknolojiler hakkındaydı. Onların düşmanı oluyor ve sonlarının gelmesine yol açıyorlardı. İnsan dışı veya İmparatorluk dışı dünyalardan bazılarının gelişimi durma noktasına geldi. İçlerinde yaşayanlar, makineleri potansiyel bir tehlike olarak görmeye başlamıştı.
